评论概述: Pretty, fits well, and looks great!
评论详情: I love this top! Its flowy, and the sleeves are super pretty and cover just enough of your shoulder without being tight. it fits well and the buttons seem good quality. It haven't washed it yet but I plan on air drying due to the material. Overall, a pretty blouse!

I got this blouse for my wife as she has been looking for new work tops. She had nothing but great things to say about it.  Pros: -you can dress it up or down -looks great out or tucked in -the size fit perfectly, the shoulder fit great as wsell -the buttons are super cute -material is soft -black one did not look wrinkly out of package at all, she didn't need to iron it -pearl buttons are cute and extra buttons are provided  Cons: -there was a long thread hanging out of the neckline, which could be a slight oversight and did not effect the top at all  In all, she loved it and loves that she added this to what she is now calling her "capsule wardrobe".
I love the sleeves and the v-neck cut. Any wrinkling that happened in the vacuum-sealed pack it came in straightened itself out almost immediately. True to size (I'm a size 4).

Just got this today, and am really pleased with this blouse. The color is beautiful, and I like the small pearl buttons. It can be a dressy blouse or more casual, depending on what you pair it with. It fits as expected and looks good on.

Very pretty blouse.  Fits well and true to size.  However, the buttons keep popping off and they don’t even button anything!  I have sewn 2 on already and only worn it once.  Maybe I will just sew them all back on.  Be careful putting in the wash as you may lose buttons.  One fell off as I was just hanging the shirt up.  It is a shame, as the material is lovely.

I love the color and the pearl "buttons" (which are just for show - not real buttons.) The green fabric is very light and pretty, and the arms are comfortable and not too constrictive. Before buying I was a little concerned the front would be too low for web calls, but it wasn't an issue after all, the V neck isn't too deep at all. Very happy with this shirt!

评论概述: The light green color very beautiful!
评论详情: It made by a good quality fabric! Like the cross cap sleeve, looks nice. Fit nicely! The V neck made small, I would like a little bigger. Also think it might look better without those front pearl buttons!

This shirt is a soft pastel blue. The fabric was a little wrinkly and definitely had to be ironed/steamed to remove the wrinkles. The cut is generous and flowy. I love the sleeve detail - a tulip hem perhaps? It's not too obvious but a simple, pretty design detail to keep the top interesting. The fabric is thicker than I expected for a "summer" top, unless you're staying in the air conditioning all day - which I probably will be since I'll just frequently wear this to the office. The length of the shirt is also generous allowing you to early tuck it the blouse, belt it, it wear it untucked. Overall it's a lovely shirt!
